data: {"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Dockerを理解する上で重要となる要素が「","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"イメージ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"」と「","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"コンテナ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"」です。ここではその二つについて解説します。","href":null}]}

{"language":"docker","parent":["FROM python:3.11
WORKDIR /app
COPY . /app
RUN pip install -r requirements.txt
CMD ["python", "app.py"]"],"caption":[]}
